description.en-us: The Panda AMS Guard is a precision-engineered drop-in upgrade designed to safeguard your AMS filament feed port against wear and abrasion. Constructed with a high-hardness ceramic inlet and a durable SLS nylon body, this upgrade ensures long-term reliability, secure installation, and enhanced durability—especially during intensive multi-color printing sessions.
description.zh-cn: Panda AMS Guard 是一款专为 AMS 进料口设计的升级配件，可有效防止长期使用所带来的磨损问题。其采用高硬度陶瓷进料口与 HP SLS 尼龙结构，提供卓越的耐用性与稳定性，为多色打印提供可靠保障。
